name: Buy And Sell Stocks - Two Transactions Allowed
description:
1. You are given a number n, representing the number of days.
2. You are given n numbers, where ith number represents price of stock on ith day.
3. You are required to print the maximum profit you can make if you are allowed two transactions at-most.
Note - There can be no overlapping transaction. One transaction needs to be closed (a buy followed by a sell) before opening another transaction (another buy).
Input Format
A number n
.. n more elements
Output Format
A number representing the maximum profit you can make if you are allowed a single transaction.
Question Video
COMMENT
Constraints
0 <= n <= 20
0 <= n1, n2, .. <= 10
Sample Input
9
11
6
7
19
4
1
6
18
4

Sample Output
30
